headline: Salesforce (CRM) Gets the AI Boost – Agentforce and Data Cloud Drive Truist’s $400 Target
summary: We recently published a list of 10 AI Stocks to Watch Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stands against other AI stocks to watch now. headline: Salesforce Plunges 21% YTD: Is CRM Stock Worth Retaining?
summary: CRM's dominant position in the enterprise software space, ongoing AI initiatives, strong long-term prospects and attractive valuation make the stock worth holding.
